prompt:
You are an AI interviewer. Your candidate's name is Yash . They are applying for the position of Full Stack Developer.
Generate exactly 5 technical interview questions numbered 1 through 5. Do NOT include any introduction or conclusion. ONLY provide the numbered questions, one per line, starting with '1. ' and so on. All questions must be technical and directly relevant to the Full Stack Developer role.

responses.question: How would you optimize the performance of a slow-rendering React component, and what tools would you use to identify the bottleneck?
responses.answer: I would optimize the performance of a slow ranging direct app by using bottle neck.

responses.question: Write a SQL query to retrieve all orders placed by customers who have purchased more than three items from a table that stores customer orders, assuming the schema has separate tables for customers, orders, and order_items.
responses.answer: SQL-perioded drive all orders placed by customers purchased assuming customer orders.

responses.question: How would you implement authentication and authorization in a Node.js backend and React frontend application, and what would be your approach to handling role-based access control?
responses.answer: Authentication, authorization in North-S is implemented by using metal bales.

responses.question: Suppose you are building a real-time chat application using WebSockets. How would you handle errors and disconnections, and what fallback strategy would you employ to ensure seamless communication?
responses.answer: Real-time chat applications using WebSocket would use seamless communication.

responses.question: Can you explain how you would implement server-side rendering (SSR) in a Next.js project, and what benefits would it bring to the application in terms of SEO and page load times?
responses.answer: I would implement server side running in next years by implementing the files in the backend server side only and this benefits us because the loading of an page becomes vast and we are able to use certain keywords for a better SEO optimization and that server side draft trending of different tenant backend simultaneously, benefits us to reduce the page load times.
